attributes.action: Harriet Harman must force an enquiry into this General election result.
attributes.additional_details:
One minute the BBC TV media were stating that it was neck and neck between Labour and the Tory's, the next minute the Tory's were zooming...That cannot be right ?



Also the Lib-Dems were crushed, why werent the Tory's equally so ?
attributes.background: We are convinced it was rigged..

rejection.details:
Your petition asks for Rt Hon Harriet Harman MP to force an inquiry into the result of the general election. This site is for petitions to the Government and the House of Commons as a whole. It would be open to you to contact Ms Harman directly if you wished to ask her to take action.

Alternatively, Parliament or the Government could commission an independent review of the election result. You could submit a new petition asking for this to happen.
